title: AFlat.co Revolutionizes the Apartment Rental Market with Innovative Digital Platform -- AFlat.co | PRLog
text: Filter News News By Country |Fr||Th||We||Tu||Mo||Su||Sa| AFlat.co Revolutionizes the Apartment Rental Market with Innovative Digital Platform New England-based Startup AFlat.co Aims to Simplify the Renting Process for Millions of Americans By: NEW ENGLAND, Mass. - April 11, 2024 - Founded by veterans in the rental space, The platform's innovative approach allows tenants to create a comprehensive profile, detailing their ideal living situation. Landlords can then directly offer flats that meet these specified needs, significantly cutting down on the back-and-forth and inefficiencies of traditional renting processes. For media inquiries, please contact: About AFlat.co: Contact AFlat.co End |:||Tags||:||Industry||:||Location||:||Subject||:| Account Email Address Account Phone Number
